Title: 39630 - # Common Mistakes New Business Owners Make
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of 4 to 8 common mistakes that new business owners often make. You may want to write about things like expecting the business to earn profits quickly, hiring low-cost employees instead of high-value employees, etc. The resource links offer plenty of suggestions you can use. Include the client link in a section about a common bookkeeping or budgeting mistakes. Your target audience is primarily interested in tech startups.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: avoid bookkeeping mistakes with Sage One's online accounting
